item.title: Cyberpunk
item.description: The cyberpunk design style is a futuristic, sci-fi style that is filled with neon and punk culture. The style is bursting with, well, style.

item.title: East Asia
item.description: East Asia is a large continent that consists mainly of Asian countries. Notable inclusions of this are [[notes/30 - 39 Topics/30 World/30.

item.title: Japan
item.description: Japan is an island country in [[notes/30 - 39 Topics/30 World/30.02 East Asia|East Asia]]. It is situated in the northwest Pacific Ocean and is bordered on the west by the Sea of Japan, extending from the Sea of Okhotsk in the north toward the East China Sea, Philippine Sea, and Taiwan in the south.
